Uses of Interface
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.api.IPlayer

Packages that use IPlayer
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.api Common interfaces for a TicTacToe board, player and move. 
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.game Game logic, rules and a tournament class. 
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.player Player classes, e.g a Random Player or Keyboard Player. 
 

Uses of IPlayer in de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.api

          Used as a substitute for a real player class, in order to hide it from its opponent.

Constructors in de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.game with parameters of type IPlayer

          Initializes a new proxy board that is bound to the player, obfuscating his opponent.

          Creates a new match between two players.

Constructor parameters in de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.game with type arguments of type IPlayer
